Bing Hua

Korean: 빙화

Height:
5'10" (177 cm)

Introduction

Bing Hua is a Chinese trainee under RND Company.

On September 26, 2024, he was revealed as a contestant on JTBC's survival show PROJECT7, which started in October 2024. He was eliminated in the final after ranking 15th place.
